title: The Netherlands: Kymora, Stefania & Sterre To Junior Eurovision 2016
text:
The Netherlands: Kymora, Stefania & Sterre To Junior Eurovision 2016
Kymora, Sterre and Stefania have been selected to represent The Netherlands at Junior Eurovision 2016.
Unlike in previous years the Netherlands this year is forming a group specifically for the contest in Malta. Kymora, Sterre and Stefania were selected from eight singers have been selected as finalists who took part in the final audition round. The eight singers who are all girls were:
Alicia (13)
Beau (11)
Blanca (13)
Kymora (11)
Loïs (12)
Milou (13)
Stefania (13)
Sterre (13)
The song they will be performing at Junior Eurovision 2016 will be decided internally by AVROTROS.
Source: Junior Songfestival
